text: Sered lyudey ye tsey khto kazhutʹ, "My virymo v BOHU," ale yak tilʹky vony zaznayutʹ budʹ-yakykh neharazdiv vnaslidok BOHA, vony equate persecution lyudey z BOZHYM retribution. Ale yakshcho blahoslovennya z vashoho Lorda prybuvayutʹ vash shlyakh, yak kazhutʹ, "My z vamy." BOH ne tsilkom awareof lyudy nayhlybshi dumky
